nodes.name: mintToken

addToken(address,address,string,string,u.details: map an harmony token to ethereum

burnToken(address,uint256,address).details: burns tokens on ethereum to be unlocked on harmony

params.recipient: recipient of the unlock tokens on ethereum

mintToken(address,uint256,address,bytes3.details: mints tokens corresponding to the tokens locked in the harmony chain

params.ethToken: is the token address for minting
params.receiptId: transaction hash of the lock event on harmony chain
params.recipient: recipient of the minted tokens (ethereum address)

removeToken(address,address).details: deregister token mapping in the token manager
